metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2560 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.0.xbefore 4.0.10.15, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.5, and 4.5.x before 4.5.5.1 allowremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) a craftedHost HTTP header, related to libraries/Config.class.php; (2) crafted JSONdata, related to file_echo.php; (3) a crafted SQL query, related tojs/functions.js; (4) the initial parameter tolibraries/server_privileges.lib.php in the user accounts page; or (5) theit parameter to libraries/controllers/TableSearchController.class.php inthe zoom search page.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
